page.title: 16THE TOR, HELMSHORE.
page.content:
The Tor is one of Helmshore's main attractions. A lot of people go up there every week.
Every year there is a race. It is called the{Tor Mile Race,}and it is held on the twenty-fifth of June.
The Tor moves and gets taller by an inch a year, because of gradual land movement. The top of the Tor is a plateau, from which you get an excellent view of the whole district.
There are a few farms on the Tor, one of which is experimental. Rough grazing pasture on the slopes of the Tor is used for sheep farming. As there is no tree cover, the slopes are exposed to cold winds.
